documentation.text:
@title Escrow
 @notice The Escrow is used to store the fees coming from succeed campaign

@title Escrow
 @notice The Escrow is used to store the fees coming from succeed campaign

returns._0: amount The amount that _spender can used from the _owner address

approve(address,uint256).details: Use for transferFrom or safeTransferFrom in case we allow someone to pull over push

getContractUSDCBalance().details: Note that USDC using 6 decimals instead of 18

returns._0: Balance The amount of USDC in the contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

allowance(address,address).notice: Getter that return the amount allow that the _spender can used from the _owner address

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve the amount that a _spender can access

getContractUSDCBalance().notice: Getter that return current balance of the escrow contract

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfer amount of fees collected to an address

userdoc.notice: The Escrow is used to store the fees coming from succeed campaign
